text: Intumwa (Muhamadi) yemeye ibyo yahishuriwe biturutse kwa Nyagasani wayo ndetse n’abemera (barabyemeye). Bose bemeye Allah, abamalayika be, ibitabo bye n’Intumwa ze; (bavuga bati) “Nta n’imwe turobanura mu Ntumwa ze.” Baranavuga bati “Twumvise kandi twumviye. Turagusaba imbabazi, Nyagasani wacu! Kandi iwawe ni ho byose bizasubira.”
